PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Alpine: location where agents had experience and towards which the truck was traveling
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Alpine area: region where Agent Andrew P. Graham and Agent Jay Snodgrass served as Border Patrol agents
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Highway 385: road at an intersection where the driver stopped
PROPER_NOUN_DESCRIPTION.Highway 90: road with a posted speed limit of 20 miles per hour
